text: And let them fear those who if they leave behind them weak offspring would be afraid for them; let them fear God and speak pertinent words. He explained in this verse that what the Muslim should accumulate for his dependents is not wealth but fear of God taqwā and righteousness ṣalāḥ for He did not say �so let them gather their wealth let them multiply real estate for them and let them leave behind household goods.� Rather He said let them fear God for He looks after the righteous.
